revision.text:
{{navbar|:Intel Wireless Gateway (WLGW2011)/Serial info|text=Serial info}} ====Boot log==== 
Wait 5 sec to boot or type 'upload' if your firmware was corrupted
and you want to reload the firmware through the XMODEM protocol.
>>Startup in progress !
Please input ROUTER password
Password:
===Settings=== 
Please input ROUTER password
Password: *****

ROUTER SETTINGS
a). ROUTER IP ADDRESS                 <192.0.2.1>
b). ROUTER SUBNET MASK                <255.255.255.0>
c). ROUTER NAME                       
d). ROUTER PASSWORD                   <*****>
e). WAN ETHERNET MAC ADDR.            <00:02:B3:65:E4:83>
f). WAN ETHERNET SETTINGS             
g). WIRELESS  SETTINGS
h). ROUTER DNS IP ADDRESS             <0.0.0.0>
i). LAN DHCP SERVER                   
j). LAN DHCP CLIENT                   
k). VIRTUAL SERVER                    
l). ROUTING TABLE
m). MAC ACCESS CONTROL LIST SETTING
n). LOAD DEFAULT SETTINGS
o). SAVE AND RESTART DEVICE
p). DEVICE INFORMATION
q). QUIT
Select ?

p). DEVICE INFORMATION
. Firmware Code Version V2.40
. UM9008 WAN ETHER MAC........ 00:02:B3:65:E4:83
. MAC ADDR for LAN............ 00:02:B3:65:E4:82
. RF ESSID....................101
. RF Channel..................11
. Encryption..................Disabled
. LAN DHCP SERVER ........... Enabled
. LAN IP ADDRESS ............. 192.0.2.1
. WAN DHCP CLIENT ........... Enabled
. WAN IP ADDRESS ............. 0.0.0.0
[[Category:Intel]]
